message: Let's split the money evenly.  Seems fair to me!  What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly lower share, but it's still a good deal for you!
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I'm not going to take much less than half. Let's try to reach an agreement!
I'm being generous, but I need to get a better deal to make it worth my while!
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to go down to 45, but I don't think I can go lower.  Time is running out!
